pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a large, neoclassical building, likely a museum or memorial. The camera pans smoothly from left to right, as if capturing the view from a moving vehicle. The foreground is blurred, emphasizing the motion past the static structure.
